Product Name: XIAOMI Redmi Note 14 6.67" 8GB RAM/256 GB ROM HyperOS -108MP AI Camera - Midnight Black
Features: Processor:Snapdragon® 6856nm manufacturing process technology CPU: Octa-core CPU, up to 2.8GHzGPU: Adreno 610 Storage & RAM: 8GB+256GB Display: 6.67" AMOLED display Refresh rate: Up to 120Hz Brightness: 1800 nits peak brightness Contrast ratio: 5,000,000:1100% DCI-P3 wide colour gamut Resolution: 2400 x 1080Corning® Gorilla® Glass 3 Rear Camera: 108MP+8MP+2MP triple camera 108MP main camera 16MP front camera Battery & Charging:5000mAh Supports 33W fast charging 33W fast charger in box (USB-C)
Reviewer Comment: A really good phone The phone is good, camera is awesome, the 108mp mode shoots great, has great contrast and good with details, the pro mode is really great for those that wants to get into it, the video also shoots 1080p60, that's for the camera geeks, the hardware is awesome and works great with the software, the speakers are amazing, I didn't really test the phone for gaming, but the AI feature an upgrade, impressed, but I'm giving it 4 stars because the description said 5g but I got LTE, I'm not returning it though, but I'm holding my one star back, lol. Good piece of gadget overall! Oh and it came with the buds, and they're pretty good.
